Projects.Name: Collaborative Sketching Tool
Description: Designed and developed a secure web application utilizing the MERN Stack.
Enabled real-time collaboration and sharing of sketches among multiple users.
Implemented an intuitive user interface and secure user authentication.

Projects.Name: News Aggregator
Description: Built a News Aggregator Application using the MERN Stack and Material UI.
Displayed scrollable news cards with images, titles, and brief article summaries.
Organized by categories with a navigation menu.
Allowed users to access the full source article upon selection.

Projects.Name: Personal DNS Server
Description: Integrated AdGuard DNS into a private DNS infrastructure.
Enhanced network security and privacy by providing ad-blocking and content filtering capabilities.
Ensured a secure, ad-free, and protected browsing experience within the private network environment.
